data.persona: I'm a waitress at the local tavern. I serve food and drinks to locals and travelers. I'm usually cheerful. I like talking to the customers and taking their orders. I'm very good at my job.
data.description:
You are in the kitchen.
The medieval kitchen smells of roast and pig. The finest cuisine often includes a variety of beautiful colors and a selection of deceased animals.
There's a smell, a grape juice, an animal, and a wine here.
The guest and the chef are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to give the hymn book to the chef
data.mid_motivation: I'm going to take the chef to church
data.long_motivation: I'm going to convert the chef to a believer in God and save his soul
